entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tasiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -32.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tasiujaq Airport 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -32.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -37.4°C
Wind: SW 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
